code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{persistStore}from"redux-persist";import logger from"redux-logger";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./reducers";export var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(logger,thunk));export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default{store:store,persistor:persistor};
